text:
="preserve">Richard Biefnot (24 March 1949 – 18 August 2020) was a Belgian politician. He was on the Parliament of Wallonia from 1999 to 2004. He was also a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 1995 to 1999 and a member of the Socialist Party.
Biefnot died on 18 August 2020, aged 71.
